name: Kim Deal
text: Neat, clean, very friendly and helpful.

name: Cornellious Sanford
text: Fast and on time when needed

name: Amanda Pruett
text: Online listed that the tool we needed was available for rent and went in and they didn’t have it. Lady that helped us was rude. Call before you go.

name: Starla Wilson
text: Little pricey but was able to get equipment needed with very little problem

name: Rod Drummond
text: Good value you a lot of tools.

name: David Cagle
text: Had what I needed and charged a little much but at least they took care of my need.

name: Denise Hicks Young
text: Friendly employees.

name: Patrick Wilder
text: Went to rent a stump grinder and without seeing the stump was told it wouldn't work. You be the judge of that...

name: John Haggard
text: Staff was very helpful and friendly.  The process was super easy. I needed a hammer drill for a single hole in my bric, so Home Depot tool rental saved me some money versus buying a drill and masonry bit.

name: Inspiring Others to Change
text: Absolutely rude customer service. Extremely elitist attitude by the customer service representatives, almost as if we are bothering them to rent equipment. I would not recommend going here unless it’s your last resort.

name: Motaz Hanson
text: Why on Earth does that place have a one star?! The friendliest employees in a home Depot ever! Jim at the tool rental was excellent. He was very patient with my questions and got me out quickly. I highly recommend this professional and friendly home Depot.

name: Phillip Arnold
text: Whatever you do dont rent from here they keep sending out broken equipment. Happened to me 2 times so far. But this second time the lady i delt with when i brought it back the next day like i was doing something wrong and was being very confrontational and argumentative. Was planning on exchanging for something else, but after how she acted i wasnt gonna rent anything else. She also didnt want to refund me but she knew i wasn't bavking dowm on the situation.

name: Jonathon hardin
text: I tried to rent a piece of equipment from here and the woman at the tool rental desk was very rude and acted like I was bothering her. I left there and went to sunbelt rentals and rented a larger piece of equipment for nearly the same cost as the very small piece Home Depot had to offer.

name: pako Silva
text: Is ok  but you can find better prices at robin rents !

name: Scott Perry
text: I rented a towable hydraulic auger to dig holes for my pole barn and a pin sheered with 3 hours left on my 24 hour rental. I still had three 18" holes to dig. They told me to bring it in and swap it, and I would get a new 24 hour rental at no extra charge. I am very satisfied with the Tool Rental Center at Home Depot at Lawson's Ridge in Madison. I will use them again and fully recommend their services.

name: Eric Ibarra
text: Convenient place to rent tools!

name: Simeon
text: Had to rent some tools, the staff was very helpful.

name: Renata K. Libhart
text: We've rented several tools here & have never encountered any problems. Will do business with again.

name: Brad C
text: Rented a floor sander and edger. Edger was missing a wrench but they didnt charge me for it. Good dudes would use them again

resp.text: Thanks so much for the feedback Brad!  We appreciate your business!

name: Tony Taylor
text: We got service and at great prices.  The staff there was very helpful with explanation of the equipment and operation of it.  They were helpful with loading and unloading.  This a no hassle place for all of your equipment rentals. Not to mention the best prices.

resp.text: Thank you Tony for the great review!  We greatly appreciate your business and taking the time to leave us some feedback!

name: bridget montgomery
text: the  staff always  is ready to help  awesome service and prices

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review Bridget!  We appreciate you taking the time to leave us some feedback!

name: Jackson Jones
text: The guys at Weathers Rental Center were awesome to do business with.  Great customer service from start to finish.  I will definitely be using services in future and will absolutely recommend to friends!!  Thanks Weathers Rental!!!!

name: Mike Williams
text: Great people and great equipment

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review Mike!  We appreciate the feedback!

name: Heath Williams
text: Great local company !

resp.text: Thanks for your review Heath!  We appreciate you taking the time to leave us some feedback!

name: allen Henry
text: Good place to rent anything you need, save you money on things you only need once

name: Wayne Kilpatrick
text: They got stuff for things and such

name: keith kelsoe
text:
These people wont work with you at all. Needed to switch out a  piece of equipment before the rental agreement was up. Wanted  me to sign a new contract.
Do not reccomend using these folks.

name: Jennifer R. Binde
text: Good service and nice people.

name: Joey Johnson
text: Good variety of products

resp.text: Thanks for the review Joey!  We appreciate you taking the time to leave us some feedback.

name: Linda Kimbrough
text: Service and availability of rental.

name: James Ray Young
text: We have rented from them for years

resp.text: Thank you for your continued business James!  We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review!

name: Kevin Sheffey
text: Great rental equipment

name: Marie mills cleaning and pressure washing service
text: excellent service

name: John Jackson
text:
You guys and girls are AWSOME !!!
THANKS FOR THE GREAT WORK.

name: Michelle G
text: I needed to have a valve replaced just before Thanksgiving. The assistant verified some information for me then called me back, just as she said she would. The mechanic replaced the valve and all parties were very pleasant.

name: Wild Hunter
text: Poor mechanics

resp.text: Mr Roulaine,  I would like to know the specifics of your visit, so I can make changes so this doesn't happen again.  Thank you for your help.  Ashville Forklift
